scripts.deploy:pages: npm run build:prod && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=quizlink
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.setup:env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const configDir = 'config'; if(fs.existsSync(path.join(configDir, 'env.local.template'))) fs.copyFileSync(path.join(configDir, 'env.local.template'), '.env.local'); if(fs.existsSync(path.join(configDir, 'env.production.template'))) fs.copyFileSync(path.join(configDir, 'env.production.template'), '.env.production'); console.log('âœ… Environment files created!')"
